preXDR is defined as resistance to any fluoroquinolone (not just levofloxacin and moxifloxacin) or resistance to a second-line injectable (amikacin, kanamycin or capreomycin) because we do not yet have the ability to collect this information under the new WHO definition.  XDR is captured under resistance to both classes identified above for preXDR or for bedaquiline or linezolid resistance if entered in our surveillance data set.
